title: Indian foreign policy
selftext:
[https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/after-us-uk-australia-five-eyes-member-new-zealand-too-criticises-india-on-order-expelling-canadian-diplomats/article67459393.ece](https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/after-us-uk-australia-five-eyes-member-new-zealand-too-criticises-india-on-order-expelling-canadian-diplomats/article67459393.ece)

The entire western bloc is criticizing India, Russia is not accepting INR for oil, Arab countries are punishing our service men, even bhutan and nepal are siding with china what is happening to our foreign policies, the current government seem to enjoy burning bridges our previous leaders built all directions but for what reason ?
